#summary A list of the client/server commands and what they do.
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =
This is a list of the client/server commands and what they do.

= Details =
||GET SYNC||Will request the current sync object from the sync server.||
||GET LIBRARY||Will request the most up-to-date library object from the sync server.||
||PUT SYNC||Will upload the clients sync object if the server allows it. The sync server will respond with either a "FORBIDDEN" or "SUCCESS" code. If sucessful, an update notification will then be broadcast to all clients giving them the opportunity to use *GET SYNC*||
